Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: An electric green hoverboard. A flat, plastic board that curves upwards at either end. It bears tacky tread diagonally across the flat portion, and a hole at the back. It hovers midair with an unknown source of power. .oO0 ~ You may 'fly with hoverboard' or 'ride hoverboard' ~ 0Oo.

An electric green hoverboard. A flat, plastic board that curves upwards at either end. It bears tacky tread diagonally across the flat portion, and a hole at the back. It hovers midair with an unknown source of power.
